title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1280.2 - Helicopter parking charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1280.2 - Helicopter parking charges

State Regulations
(a) For the time during which a helicopter is on the heliport following the
preceding landing of such helicopter and prior to its next succeeding take-off: (1)

Free time. For the initial 30 minutes
period as provided in section
1280.1
hereof............ No
charge. (2)

Additional time. For
each helicopter remaining on the heliport in excess of the free time permitted
under this section, and provided prior arrangement for helicopter parking is
made with the Port Authority or its authorized representative, the following
helicopter parking rates will be charged: (i) For the first hour or fraction thereof............ $3
(ii)

For each additional hour or fraction
thereof (except as hereinafter provided)............ $2
(iii)

For each hour or fraction thereof that
a helicopter remains parked on the heliport in excess of four hours, unless by
prior arrangement, such parking was for a greater period of time, and, in that
event, for each hour or fraction thereof in excess of such agreed period of
time............ $10
(b) Maximum parking time permitted shall be
dependent on space available andthe discretion of the Port Authority or its
authorized representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1280.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
